ComicInfo.Title: Tigra Tigra, Burning Bright!
ComicInfo.Summary: Tigra Tigra, Burning Bright!: Kraven the Hunter uses a collar to control the feral super-heroine Tigra and sets up a battle to the death between Tigra and Spider-Man. Spider-Man frees Tigra and they join forces against Kraven.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:44:39. [Issue ID 32055]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Inker: Dave Hunt,Joe Sinnott,John Byrne,Dave Hunt,John Byrne
ComicInfo.Letterer: Annette Kawecki,Gaspar Saladino,A. Kawecki,Gaspar Saladino,A. Kawecki
